name: Wayward Rose
description: Wayward Rose is an indie thriller, created by a team of student developers. Step into the shoes of Rose, a young girl lost in the dark and ominous woods. Armed with only her wits and determination, she must navigate through treacherous terrain and evade the wolves and phantoms that haunt her every move. Will she be able to find her way out and escape the clutches of the unknown?
publishers: John Paul the Great Catholic University
